faq.title: Common questions from Shopify merchants
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to evaluate Recete before installing.

q1.question: How long does setup take?
q1.answer: Most merchants connect Shopify and configure their first flows in under 15 minutes. You can start with default templates and refine later.

q2.question: Do I need a support team to use it?
q2.answer: No. Recete is designed to reduce manual support workload. You can still enable human handoff for escalations or sensitive conversations.

q3.question: How does Recete reduce returns?
q3.answer: It sends proactive post-purchase messages, usage guidance, and timely follow-ups that answer common questions before they become return requests.

q4.question: Is customer data secure?
q4.answer: Yes. We use encrypted data handling and merchant-level controls to protect customer information and operational access.
